text.sentence: well, i looked up "fag" on websters and it had a picture of you sucking jerry's balls you homo.
i informed you guys that i needed to rest my elbow and would not be able to play softball last week.
that was plenty of time, it wasn't like i bailed out at the last minute you pillow biter.
if i cannot even hold a pencil when my tendinitis acts up then i really do not want to take a chance with it, so deal with it.
even so, i called kevin after i heard your message (but inadvertently erased it) and told him i would play if the games were late and you really needed me.
never mind the fact that i had a ton of work to do and i was up until 3:00 am doing that work; yet i still said that i would go out there.
i applaud you for batting left-handed, since it couldn't have been any worse than you batting right-handed.
as far as not speaking to me for three days why not make it more? it really doesn't bother me.
if you're going to insult me at least know how to spell my name mr moolknar it's spelled m-i-h-a-l-y.
